overview: She's sexy alright, and licensed to thrill! Hyapatia Lee stars as a sultry sexologist who insists on getting up close and personal with her clients in this scintillating romp. Hyapatia begins her day by helping a couple get over their fear of oral sex - and by watching the wanton results. But when her jealous hubby calls the office, Hyapatia is compelled to make a choice. He wants to watch her at work, and she isn't sure that would be ethical. In the end, she decides to let him peek through a two-way mirror as she dispenses advice and eroticism in dazzling doses.
title: Sexy
